name: Boss Level
description: Trapped in a time loop that constantly repeats the day of his murder, a former special forces agent must unlock the mystery behind his untimely demise.

review.author: danielcereto
review.heading: Groundhog day meets Crank
review.reviewBody: This movie is just for fun. Do not take seriously and enjoy the ride. Pure action, good acting and acceptable (not great) FX'S. Frank Grillo is still believable as an action movie star and Mel Gibson is great as a villain too. So, forget twists and great scripts and enjoy the ride, just for fun.

keywords: time loop,dying repeatedly,day repeats itself,end of the world,one against many
